summary: Completed comprehensive testing of bee2bee website iteration 2 design improvements - all required features implemented and working correctly
passed_tests: Metrics section: numbers correctly styled in orange (#ff6a00) color
Philosophy section: SVG growth illustration visible on desktop right side
Philosophy section: 3 bullet points displayed as unordered list with orange bullets
Philosophy section: 'Not noise. Not vanity. Real growth.' text center-aligned at bottom
Expertise section: all 13 cards displayed with icons and hover accent line effects
Experience timeline: decorative elements (icon badges + skill tags) visible on desktop right side
Industry carousel: auto-sliding animation with all 8 industries with icons
What I Build section: 7 cards with icons in 4+3 centered grid layout
Closing section: correct two-column layout - content left, HubSpot form placeholder right
Navigation: smooth scrolling to all sections working perfectly
Mobile responsive: navigation toggle, overlay, and responsive layout working
All hover effects: expertise cards, industry pills, build cards functioning properly
